data.title: Unmanned Aerial Systems at CWI: Let's Get Started
data.meta_description: This program provides comprehensive training in the operation, application, and management of unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs), or drones.
data.text:
Program Overview

Embark on an exciting career with the Unmanned Aerial Systems (UAS) program at College of Western Idaho (CWI). This program offers you practical, hands-on training in UAS operations, covering essential areas like mission planning, data capture, and digital imagery processing. With applications spanning agriculture, search and rescue, and real estate, your skills will be in high demand. Our experienced instructors and cutting-edge facilities ensure you gain the knowledge and expertise needed to excel in this rapidly growing field.

Be prepared to complete the FAA Commercial Remote Pilot certification with focused, intensive training that meets industry standards. Whether you pursue a Basic Technical Certificate or an Associate of Applied Science (AAS) degree, you will be prepared to enter the workforce with a strong, competitive advantage. The AAS degree also offers entrepreneurship training, giving you the tools to start and manage your own business.
